DefaultEvent.Description: Thy will hath been done. You should have everything that you require.
DefaultEvent.Name: Boom!

ChildBranches.Name: The Cornucopia of Cheating
ChildBranches.Description: Give me everything that I need to complete this storyline. (Skills will not be changed.)

DefaultEvent.Description: All of your terror and pain is washed away. No, *you're* welcome.
DefaultEvent.Name: Ah, that's better...

ChildBranches.Name: The Nice Cup Of Tea of Terror Reduction
ChildBranches.Description: Take it away. All of it. Also any Wounds.

ChildBranches.Name: Flask Of Opprobrium
ChildBranches.Description: Become the Scourge of the Sorrow-Spiders

ChildBranches.Name: A Lethe Injection
ChildBranches.Description: Make the Sorrow-Spiders forget who you are, and any transgressions. (Reset story)

DefaultEvent.Description:
With SAY, help at the festival, then with a second SAY, meet the Emissary of Spiders to unlock the first assignment - bringing Tomb Colonists to feed the spider-council on the web-linked island.

Bring the Tomb Colonists. Sorry. Got to be done!

In the Web of Stone, either spy to get background on the story or skip the timer ahead to meet with the spider council and be sent to the Nocturne.

COMING SOON: At the Wreck Of The Nocturne, explore until you get the Scholar's Diary.

COMING SOON: Return to the Web Of Stone

OPTIONAL: Rescue the Captain of the Nocturne

Return to the Nocturne

Fight a Lorn Fluke (Note: Failure is impossible, but success offers bonus treasure. Having the Captain on board gives a bonus to skill checks)

Return one last time to Saviour's Rocks for the Festival of Silk and the quest reward.

Alternate path - burn the tree at the Web of Stone. This changes the Nativity and makes the Scuttering Reaches far more dangerous.
DefaultEvent.Name: Are you sitting comfortably? Good. Then I'll begin.

ChildBranches.Name: I'm Testing This - What Should Happen?

Name: LIMBO'D - Saviour's Rocks Magic Cheat Menu
